paragraphs:
MCA from Amity University, Noida with BCA background. Skilled in Python, Java, C, web devel- opment, SQL, and data
visualization (Power BI, Excel, Tableau). Experienced in IoT, automation systems, and multidisciplinary projects.

Expanding expertise in Data Science, Generative AI, and Agentic AI with Agile methodologies (Scrum, Kanban, Jira). Published research in IEEE Xplore on smart automated systems. Passionate about innovation, continuous learning, and
technology-driven problem-solving.
